channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Washington's proposed millionaire tax sparks concerns of broader levy, 'damage' to state's economy
item.description: Washington state GOP Chair Jim Walsh opposes the proposed millionaire tax, saying "nobody wants it" and warns that it could lead to broader income tax...

item.title: The 9 most disruptive deals of Trump’s first year back in the White House
item.description: President Trump's unorthodox dealmaking style has left the business community scrambling to adapt.

item.title: Xreal And Viture’s Ugly Legal Fight Shines A Negative Light On XR
item.description: Xreal sued its main competitor, Viture, for patent infringement on its older XR glasses design, despite being named a lead partner for AndroidXR.

item.title: CES 2026 Shows That Competition Is Alive And Healthy Among PC Makers
item.description: The AI PC has not taken off as expected, but PC OEMs keep innovating and differentiating on design and software, with AI playing a bigger role in PCs ...

item.title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra: Leaked Before Launch, New Price Rise?
item.description: Samsung has accidentally leaked all new Galaxy S26 models weeks ahead of their launch.

item.title: Satya Nadella’s biggest AI bubble warning yet is a challenge to the Fortune 500: It’s time to reinvent the knowledge worker
item.description: The Microsoft CEO offers a fix to the AI productivity dilemma, calling on business leaders to shift workflows to match the structural design of the te...

item.title: History says there’s a 90% chance that Trump’s party will lose seats in the midterm elections. It also says there’s a 100% chance
item.description: Since 1946, there have been 20 midterm elections. In 18 of them, the president’s party lost seats in the House of Representatives.

item.title: Trust has become the crisis CEOs can’t ignore at Davos, as new data show 70% of people turning more ‘insular’
item.description: Trust guru Richard Edelman worries that time is running out for leaders to rebuild trust.

item.title: Telegrapher Speakers Releases Raccoons, Foxes, Pandas And Hippos At NAMM 2026
item.description: Telegrapher will be at NAMM with the new Carbon Fox, Raccoon, Panda and Hippo speakers, alongside the original lineup of Fox, Gorilla, Gorilla-S, Elep...

item.title: Selling America is a ‘dangerous bet,’ UBS CEO warns as markets panic
item.description: Gold is surging, and the dollar is sliding—but UBS’s CEO says the real risk is betting against the U.S.

item.title: AI Ramifications Of Apple’s Google Play For Siri
item.description: Apple reportedly partners with Google Gemini to power future Apple Intelligence, shifting from in-house models.

item.title: Dow ends down 870 points as stocks book worst day since October
Gold and silver hit fresh records as Trump’s moves are 'scaring investors'
Why Micron’s stock is a standout gainer as the market falters
Intel’s stock pops as it finds a growing chorus on Wall Street
Trade war redux? Greenland dispute threatens $1T in trade between U.S., Europe.
Airlines have 580 million reasons to like GLP-1 weight-loss drugs, analysis finds
item.description: U.S. airline companies stand to save hundreds of millions each year from Americans losing weight thanks to GLP-1 drugs, according to a new study.

item.title: 13K pounds of ready-to-eat grilled chicken breasts recalled over possible listeria contamination
item.description: More than 13,000 pounds of grilled chicken breasts distributed to seven states were recalled over concerns they may be contaminated with listeria.

item.title: Americans' paychecks grow stronger as Main Street shows new economic strength
item.description: New economic data reveals Main Street strength as Americans see higher pay, while retail sales rose 3.3% and home purchases increased amid lower mortg...

item.title: Miami eyes massive $3B sports economic boost as Trump expected to attend college football championship
item.description: South Florida's ultimate sporting events lineup for 2026 delivers billions in economic impact, positioning Miami as the premier sports tourism destina...

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
